alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 1:32PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Tammany, central Tangipahoa and southwestern Washington Parishes through 215 PM CDT... At 131 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Natalbany, or near Hammond, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Folsom, Natalbany and Tickfaw. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 31 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Washington
